name: confluence-data-center
title: Confluence Data Center
description: Search Confluence content with advanced filters and CQL syntax support
author: tofrankie

preferences.name: confluenceDomain
preferences.title: Confluence Domain
preferences.description: Your Confluence Data Center domain without https:// (e.g., wiki.yourcompany.com)

preferences.name: confluencePersonalAccessToken
preferences.title: Confluence Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Your Confluence Personal Access Token for API authentication. Create it from: Profile → Personal Access Tokens → Create token
preferences.placeholder: Enter your Confluence Personal Access Token

preferences.name: confluenceCacheUserAvatar
preferences.title: Cache Confluence User Avatars
preferences.description: Cache user avatars locally. Enable if your Confluence requires authentication to access avatars.
preferences.label: Enable avatar caching

preferences.name: searchPageSize
preferences.title: Results Per Page
preferences.description: Number of search results to display per page (default: 20). Increase if pagination doesn't trigger properly.

preferences.name: jiraDomain
preferences.title: Jira Domain
preferences.description: Your Jira Data Center domain without https:// (e.g., jira.yourcompany.com)

preferences.name: jiraPersonalAccessToken
preferences.title: Jira Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Your Jira Personal Access Token for API authentication. Create it from: Profile → Personal Access Tokens → Create token
preferences.placeholder: Enter your Jira Personal Access Token

preferences.name: jiraCacheUserAvatar
preferences.title: Cache Jira User Avatars
preferences.description: Cache user avatars locally. Enable if your Jira requires authentication to access avatars.
preferences.label: Enable avatar caching

commands.name: confluence-search-content
commands.title: Search Content
commands.subtitle: Confluence
commands.description: Search Confluence content with advanced filters and CQL syntax support

preferences.name: confluenceDisplayRecentlyViewed
preferences.title: Display Recently Viewed on Open
preferences.description: When enabled, show recently viewed content by default when opening the command.
preferences.label: Show recently viewed by default

commands.name: confluence-search-space
commands.title: Search Space
commands.subtitle: Confluence
commands.description: Search Confluence spaces with type filters

commands.name: jira-search-issue
commands.title: Search Issue
commands.subtitle: Jira
commands.description: Search Jira issues with advanced filters and JQL syntax support
